sentences: It was Vert who, as Edward Elgar's concert manager,  sent Elgar's Enigma Variations to another of his concert management clients,  Vienna Philharmonic Orchestra conductor Hans Richter,  who premiered the work in London in 1899.

The roll-call of famous musicians on its books was unmatched, and included such international stars as Clara Butt, Fritz Kreisler, Pablo Casals, Sergei Rachmaninov, Andrés Segovia, Kathleen Ferrier, Myra Hess, Jacqueline du Pré, Julian Lloyd Webber, Clifford Curzon and Vladimir Ashkenazy, to name but a handful ... the legacy and influence of Ibbs and Tillett has remained a benchmark in today's highly competitive world of artist management and concert promotion, many of whose principal operators began their working lives as ‘Ibblets.’
